reviewText: The content is acceptable for people who have never had any background in caregiving... a reasonable starting point. However, the sound quality is really lacking. I had hoped to show this to some spouses in a support group, but I know they will not be able to hear several of the taped conversations and comments. Too bad. I had high hopes for this.
I would recommend this book to anyone who is the caregiver for another. You have to take care of yourself in order to care for others. Very useful book!
